snippet: The dangerous standoff between Russia and Ukraine could be moving toward a resolution if President Vladimir Putin remains true to his words.
abstract: Editorial asserts Russian Pres Vladimir Putin has compelling reasons to step back from confrontation in Ukraine, as he has suggested he will do; speculates Putin may fear losing control over increasingly violent region, or that he may feel his objectives have already been met; warns if pullback proves to be feint, United States and Europe must press ahead with strong sanctions.
lead_paragraph: The dangerous standoff between Russia and Ukraine could be moving toward a resolution if President Vladimir Putin remains true to his words.

headline.main: Amid Tensions, a Gesture From Putin
headline.print_headline: Amid Tensions, a Gesture From Putin
